TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit UIPermission extends System.Security.CodeAccessPermission implements class System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission
Public NotInheritable Class UIPermission Inherits CodeAccessPermission Implements IUnrestrictedPermission
public ref class UIPermission sealed : System::Security::CodeAccessPermission, System::Security::Permissions::IUnrestrictedPermission

summary.span: 控制与用户界面和剪贴板相关的权限。

span.span: Controls the permissions related to user interfaces and the Clipboard.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows 中的绘制和用户输入的事件是用户界面。Drawing and user input events in windows are user interfaces. 使用 windows 的权限可以是以下之一： 不受限制，限制为，则只，或没有绘制的窗口或用户输入事件允许的访问。The permission to use windows can be one of the following: unrestricted, limited to , only , or no window drawing or user input event access allowed. 和标题和大小，以避免通过潜在的有害代码可能欺骗限制。 and are restricted in title and size to prevent possible spoofing by potentially harmful code. 使用剪贴板的权限可以是以下之一： 没有剪贴板访问权限允许或不受限制，只写。The permission to use the Clipboard can be one of the following: unrestricted, write-only, or no Clipboard access allowed. 粘贴限制阻止可能有害的应用程序而无需用户的同意，同时仍允许剪切、 复制和粘贴操作时由用户通过键盘命令启动剪贴板中获取数据。The paste limitation prevents potentially harmful applications from taking data from the Clipboard without the user's consent, while still allowing the cut, copy, and paste operations when initiated by the user through keyboard commands.

summary.span: 创建并返回当前权限的相同副本。

span.span: Creates and returns an identical copy of the current permission.
A copy of the current permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 权限的副本与原始权限资源表示相同的访问权限。A copy of the permission represents the same access to resources as the original permission. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的行为方法。The following code example shows the behavior of the method. 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例旨在演示方法，不是为了演示其用法的行为。The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use. 安全基础结构; 一般情况下，使用权限类的方法它们通常不使用应用程序中。In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications. Public Overrides Function Intersect (target As IPermission) As IPermission

param.name: target
param.span: 要与当前权限相交的权限。

span.span: A permission to intersect with the current permission.

param.span: 它必须与当前权限属于同一类型。

span.span: It must be the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 创建并返回一个权限，该权限是当前权限与指定权限的交集。

span.span: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 表示当前权限和指定权限的交集的一个新权限。

span.span: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果交集为空，则此新权限为 。

span.span: This new permission is if the intersection is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下两个权限的交集是描述组的二者共同描述的操作的权限。The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the set of operations they both describe in common. 具体而言，它表示的权限级别最低值和中当前权限和指定的权限。Specifically, it represents the least permissive values of and from those in the current permission and the specified permission. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的行为方法。The following code example shows the behavior of the method. 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例旨在演示方法，不是为了演示其用法的行为。The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use. 安全基础结构; 一般情况下，使用权限类的方法它们通常不使用应用程序中。In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool IsSubsetOf(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function IsSubsetOf (target As IPermission) As Boolean

param.name: target
param.span: 将要测试子集关系的权限。

span.span: A permission to test for the subset relationship.

param.span: 此权限必须与当前权限属于同一类型。

span.span: This permission must be the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 确定当前权限是否为指定权限的子集。

span.span: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果当前权限是指定权限的子集，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果成功用于当前权限的所有要求也成功都完成指定的权限，则当前权限是指定权限的子集。The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if all demands that succeed for the current permission also succeed for the specified permission. 它是指定的权限至少包含的子集中包含的权限。That is, the specified permission contains at least the permissions contained in the subset. 有关返回`true`，这两个和当前权限的值必须等于或比指定权限的值不太宽松。For to return `true`, both the and values of the current permission must be equal to or less permissive than the values of the specified permission. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的行为方法。The following code example shows the behavior of the method. 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例旨在演示方法，不是为了演示其用法的行为。The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use. 安全基础结构; 一般情况下，使用权限类的方法它们通常不使用应用程序中。In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool IsUnrestricted() cil managed

summary.span: 返回一个值，该值指示当前权限是否不受限制。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether the current permission is unrestricted.

returns.span: 如果当前权限不受限制，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current permission is unrestricted; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无限制的权限表示对权限所保护的所有资源的访问权限。An unrestricted permission represents access to any and all resources protected by the permission.

Public Overrides Function Union (target As IPermission) As IPermission

param.name: target
param.span: 与当前权限合并的权限。

span.span: A permission to combine with the current permission.

param.span: 它必须与当前权限属于同一类型。

span.span: It must be the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 创建一个权限，它是该权限与指定权限的并集。

span.span: Creates a permission that is the union of the permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 表示同时兼具当前权限和指定权限的新权限。

span.span: A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对的调用结果是表示由当前的权限表示的所有操作，以及由指定权限表示的所有操作的权限。The result of a call to is a permission that represents all the operations represented by the current permission as well as all the operations represented by the specified permission. 具体而言，它表示的最大权限值和中当前权限和指定的权限。Specifically, it represents the most permissive values of and from those in the current permission and the specified permission. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的行为方法。The following code example shows the behavior of the method. 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例旨在演示方法，不是为了演示其用法的行为。The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use. 安全基础结构; 一般情况下，使用权限类的方法它们通常不使用应用程序中。In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications.
